    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:758px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox10360338">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10360338">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10360338">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           United States Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10360338">
          <div id="boxatt10360338" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12598819">
              <a id="link_12598819" href="http://factfinder2.census.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12598819,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598819}); ">
               American Factfinder
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A database from the U.S. Census Bureau with population, housing, and business statistics at the country, state, county, city, and zip code levels.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599051">
              <a id="link_12599051" href="http://fedstats.sites.usa.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599051,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599051}); ">
               FedStats
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to official statistical information produced by the U.S. federal government.  Browse by topic or agency or search across agency websites.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12598902">
              <a id="link_12598902" href="http://www.icpsr.umich.edu/index.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12598902,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598902}); ">
               ICPSR (Inter-University Consortium for Political and Social Research)
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               A data archive of more than 500,000 files of research in the social sciences. Specialized collections of data in education, aging, criminal justice, substance abuse, terrorism, and other fields.  Full access available only to Muhlenberg faculty, students, and staff who create accounts using their Muhlenberg email addresses.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12598882">
              <a id="link_12598882" href="http://nces.ed.gov/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12598882,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598882}); ">
               National Center for Education Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Find statistics re. early childhood, elementary, secondary, and post-secondary education.  From the U.S. Department of Education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12598992">
              <a id="link_12598992" href="http://nces.ed.gov/surveys/pss/privateschoolsearch/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12598992,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598992}); ">
               NCES Private School Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Find school and enrollment characteristics for private schools.  From the National Center for Education Statistics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12598978">
              <a id="link_12598978" href="http://nces.ed.gov/ccd/schoolsearch/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12598978,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12598978}); ">
               NCES Public School Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Find enrollment, staff, fiscal, and other characteristics by public school and district.  From the National Center for Education Statistics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599008">
              <a id="link_12599008" href="http://nces.ed.gov/programs/stateprofiles/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599008,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599008}); ">
               NCES State Education Data Profiles
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search for statewide information in elementary/secondary education characteristics and finance, postsecondary education, public libraries, assessments, and selected demographics for all states.  From the National Center for Education Statistics.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599029">
              <a id="link_12599029" href="http://www.pde.state.pa.us/portal/server.pt/community/data_and_statistics/7202" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599029,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599029}); ">
               PDE Data and Statistics
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Information about schools, student progress, graduation rates, school districts in Pennsylvania.  From the Pennsylvania Department of Education.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599248">
              <a id="link_12599248" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599248,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox10360341">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="10360341">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title10360341">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           International Statistics
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content10360341">
          <div id="boxatt10360341" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link12599275">
              <a id="link_12599275" href="http://www.census.gov/aboutus/stat_int.html" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599275,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599275}); ">
               International Statistical Agencies
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to international statistical agencies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599230">
              <a id="link_12599230" href="http://www.offstats.auckland.ac.nz/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599230,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599230}); ">
               OFFSTATS
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Links to free official, international statistics resources by country, region, and subject.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599240">
              <a id="link_12599240" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.proquest.com/statistical" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599240,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599240}); ">
               ProQuest Statistical Insight
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistical information produced by U.S. federal agencies, states, and intergovernmental organizations.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599184">
              <a id="link_12599184" href="http://data.un.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599184,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599184}); ">
               U.N. Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Search across the United Nation's statistical databases.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link12599157">
              <a id="link_12599157" href="http://data.worldbank.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(12599157,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'Education Subject Guide', 'page_name' : 'Finding Data &amp; Statistics'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12599157}); ">
               World Bank Data
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Statistics for countries around the world on a wide variety of topics, including education-related topics.  From the World Bank.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>

    </div>
